title: ForTube ETH Version “Governance Lockup” Adjustment Proposal ForTube ETH版本治理锁仓调整提案
body:
ForTube V3 is an upgraded version that the ForTube team combined with the current DeFi ecosystem and historical experience, after multiple demonstrations and careful planning. The aim is to more opportunities, higher income, and more flexible value capture opportunities for FOR holders: holders not only earn investment income of $fDAO tokens, but also share the operating income of the platform.
After ForTube V3 is released, the FOR “Token Economic Model” will be adjusted majorly. The specific deflationary model will be finalized and will be submitted to the community for voting. Meanwhile, once the deflationary plan passes, FOR which is still in the governance lockup process will not be able to participate in the deflation swapping in time, and must wait until the lockup period expires before participating.
 
Therefore, the result of this voting may affect the user’s following token holding strategy. Community members are requested to consider comprehensively and vote carefully.
 
In response to this expectation, and based on community feedback, the proposal of the ForTube ETH version “Governance Lockup” is adjusted as follows:
 
Voting Time: March 24th, 2021 19:00 — March 25th, 2021 19:00 (GMT+8)
 
Plan A: Holders are not allowed to unlock FOR in the governance lockup in advance, and the lockup reward remains unchanged; remove the governance lockup function. (Subsequent bonus adjustments during lockup period will be voted through Snapshot.)
 
Plan B: Unlock all FOR in the governance lockup; remove the new governance lockup function.
 
Plan C: Open unlock FOR function in the governance lockup, and the voluntary unlocking period is 24 hours. The lockup period will be restored after 24 hours. After the lockup expires, FOR can be unlocked; remove the new governance lockup function. (Subsequent bonus adjustments during lockup period will be voted through Snapshot)
 
Please note: In the new community governance structure:
1) Users can pledge their assets to a certain fDAO pool and obtain the corresponding $fDAO tokens based on their own risk preferences.
2) fDAO manages its lending pool and covers parts of the risks;
3) $fDAO token holders share 60% of the platform’s revenue.

ForTube V3版本，是ForTube团队结合当前DeFi生态和历史经验，经过反复论证和精心规划的升级版本。其核心目的，是为持FOR用户提供了更多方式，更高收益，更加灵活的价值捕获机会：用户不仅可以获取$fDAO代币的投资收益，还可以分享平台的运营收益。
 
ForTube V3 发布后，将择期对FOR【代币经济模型】进行重大调整，具体通缩模型即将定型，并将提交社区投票。届时，如果通缩方案通过，那么依然处于治理锁仓状态下的FOR，将无法及时参与通缩映射，必须等到锁仓期满才可参与。
 
因此，本次投票结果可能影响用户后续的持币策略，请社区成员综合考虑，审慎投票。
 
针对这种预期，根据社区的反馈意见，ForTube ETH版本【治理锁仓】调整提案如下：
 
投票时间：2021年3月24日19:00——3月25日 19:00
 
A方案：不允许提前解锁治理锁仓中的FOR，锁仓奖励维持不变；停止新增治理锁仓功能。（后续锁仓期奖励调整，将通过Snapshot进行投票表决）
 
B方案： 治理锁仓中的FOR全部解锁；停止新增治理锁仓功能。
 
C方案：治理锁仓中的FOR开放解锁功能，自愿解锁期为24小时。24小时之后恢复锁定期，锁仓到期后，才可进行FOR的解锁；停止新增治理锁仓功能。（后续锁仓期奖励调整，将通过Snapshot进行投票表决）
 
 
注：在全新的社区治理架构中
1) 用户可以根据自己的风险偏好，将资产质押至某个fDAO池中，并获得对应的$fDAO代币；
2) fDAO对其借贷池进行治理，并兜底部分风险；
3) $fDAO代币的持有者，共同分享平台60%的收益。
author: 0xd49524f9FDC4EA8ba65345253C2B9FdE3b6FAF3A
